title: Stackable Washer/Dryer*, Pool & Hot Tub, W/S/G Included
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.
Known as a “city in a park,” Bellevue boasts vibrant, wooded neighborhoods, freshwater lakes and lush green spaces.
Seamlessly woven into the fabric of this serene suburb, Kendall Ridge sits in a park-like setting surrounded by mature trees and beautifully landscaped grounds.
Each studio, one and two bedroom apartment home for rent combines a flexible layout with convenient features.
The inviting floor plans take advantage of all the space with conveniences such as walk-in closets and private patios or balconies in many homes.
These homes raise the bar on comfortable living with finishes such as plush carpeting, vertical blinds and well-equipped kitchens.
Dishwasher, Range, Private Deck or Patio, W/S/G Included, Refrigerator
Pool & Hot Tub, Clubhouse, Dishwashers*, Fitness Center, Decks and/or Patios, Stackable Washer/Dryer*, Sports Court
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
